'''Automated Weapon Systems''' are devices found within the [[Misty Dungeon]] Event Domain that will detect and attack any intruders. Using the appropriate reactions can temporarily disable these devices.

==Abilities and Attacks==
''Attack names are unofficial.''

===Pyro===
* '''Aimed Projectile:''' Fires multiple fireballs at the player, dealing {{Color|Pyro DMG}}.

===Cryo===
* '''Aimed Projectile:''' Fires multiple ice shards at the player, dealing {{Color|Cryo DMG}}.

===Hydro===
* '''Homing Bubble:''' Launches a [[bubble]] that will trap the player upon contact, dealing {{Color|Hydro DMG}}.

===Electro===
* '''Electrical Shock:''' Sends one pulse of electricity to the player, dealing {{Color|Electro DMG}}.
* '''Lightning Spark:''' Summons lightning from the sky, dealing {{Color|[[AoE]] Electro DMG}}.
